country: Country ISO 3166 code (see c_sample for codes for the sample)
c_sample: Country/ Sample ISO 3166 code (see country for codes for whole nation states)
c_alphan: Country/ Sample Prefix ISO 3166 code - alphanumeric
v1: Q1a Working mom can establish as warm relationship as a not working mom
v2: Q1b Pre-school child is likely to suffer if mother works
v3: Q1c Family life suffers when woman has full-time job
v4: Q1d What women really want is home and kids
v5: Q1e Being housewife is as fulfilling as working for pay
v6: Q1f Men's job earn money, women's job look after home
v7: Q2a Women or Men more responsibility for home and family
v8: Q2b Mother or father better suited to look after children
v9: Q3a Should women work: child under school age
v10: Q3b Should women work: youngest kid at school
v11: Q4a Children interfere too much with parents' freedom
v12: Q4b Children increase social standing in society

v14: Q4d Couple living together without marriage ok

v16: Q5b Single father can raise child as well

v25: Q7f Mother, father: who should try to be role model for the child
v26: Q8 Paid leave: no/ yes, how long should paid leave be available
v27: Q9 Paid leave: how to divide between parents

v29: Q10b Child under school age: least desirable parental childcare

v31: Q12 Child under school age: covering childcare costs
